entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
